What is the outlook for Fibromuscular Dysplasia ?,"Currently there is no cure for FMD. Medicines and angioplasty can reduce the risk of initial or recurrent stroke. In rare cases, FMD-related aneurysms can burst and bleed into the brain, causing stroke, permanent nerve damage, or death.",NINDS,Fibromuscular Dysplasia
